title: Vogue easy sewing - Timesaving techniques, shortcuts, tips and tricks for today's busy sewers
author: Vogue Knitting
desc: Explains how to plan a wardrobe, shows how to read and use patterns, and demonstrates a variety of special sewing techniques, including bindings, facings, darts, pockets, sleeves, collars, and cuffs.
Categories: Housekeeping & Leisure - Handicraft: Cutting and Sewing
